snippet: The United Nations Relief and Works Agency in the Gaza Strip stopped food distribution and other services for refugees indefinitely, an official said Friday.
abstract: United Nations Relief and Works Agency indefinitely suspends food distribution in Gaza Strip after protesters, angry over cancellation of cash assistance program, storm agency’s main compound.

byline.contributor: Fares Akram contributed reporting from the Gaza Strip.

lead_paragraph: The United Nations Relief and Works Agency in the Gaza Strip stopped food distribution and other services for refugees indefinitely, an official said Friday.

headline.seo: U.N. Agency Suspends Food Aid After Protest in Gaza
headline.main: U.N. Agency Suspends Food Aid in Gaza After Protesters Break Into Its Compound
headline.print_headline: U.N. Agency Suspends Food Aid in Gaza After Protesters Break Into Its Compound
